document_data.caption: ''Vilithrax, the ancient dracolich.''
document_data.name: Vilithrax
document_data.mainbody: '''Vilithrax''' was a [[dracolich]] that was summoned by the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the [[Whispering Caverns]] to guard them in their attempts to locate the hoard of the ancient [[dragon]] [[Saphirax]].
